app.title: Payroll
app.content: Keep track of everyone's salaries and whether or not they've been paid. Direct deposit not supported.

app.title: Claim expenses
app.content: All of your receipts organized into one place, as long as you don't mind typing in the data by hand.

app.title: VAT handling
app.content: We only sell our software to companies who don't deal with VAT at all, so technically we do all the VAT stuff they need.

app.title: Reporting
app.content: Easily export your data into an Excel spreadsheet where you can do whatever the hell you want with it.

features.title: Stay on top of things with always up-to-date reporting features.
features.content: We talked about reporting in the section above but we needed three items here, so mentioning it one more time for posterity.

features.title: Never lose track of what's in stock with accurate inventory tracking.
features.content: We don't offer this as part of our software but that statement is inarguably true. Accurate inventory tracking would help you for sure.

features.title: Organize all of your contacts, service providers, and invoices in one place.
features.content: This also isn't actually a feature, it's just some friendly advice. We definitely recommend that you do this, you'll feel really organized and professional.

prices.title: Starter
prices.text: Good for anyone who is self-employed and just getting started.

list.item: Track up to 15 expenses per month

prices.title: Small business
prices.text: Perfect for small / medium sized businesses.

list.item: Track up to 50 expenses per month

prices.title: Enterprise
prices.text: For even the biggest enterprise companies.

list.item: Track up to 200 expenses per month
Export up to 25 reports, including TPS

faq.q: What was that testimonial about tax fraud all about?
faq.a: TaxPal is just a software application, ultimately your books are your responsibility.

faq.q: TaxPal sounds horrible but why do I still feel compelled to purchase?
faq.a: This is the power of excellent visual design. You just can't resist it, no matter how poorly it actually functions.

faq.q: I found other companies called TaxPal, are you sure you can use this name?
faq.a: Honestly not sure at all. We haven't actually incorporated or anything, we just thought it sounded cool and made this website.
You just tell us what data you need a report for, and we get our kids to create beautiful charts for you using only the finest crayons.

faq.q: I lost my password, how do I get into my account?
faq.a: Send us an email and we will send you a copy of our latest password spreadsheet so you can find your information.
